creator.description:
Formerly, a labeler for curating content on your skyline.  Unofficially targeting most sorts of content you would expect to see CW'd on Mastodon.

Not an official service of Bluesky.

locales.description: User has requested they not be commented on, reposted, and/or quoted, or has requested interaction from only a direct set of users.  We strongly suggest you mark these users as 'hidden' to prevent unwanted interactions.
locales.name: DNI Requested

locales.description: Acts, depictions, descriptions, or promotion of domestic abuse.
locales.name: Domestic Abuse

locales.description: Acts, depictions, descriptions, or promotion of child abuse.
locales.name: Child Abuse

locales.description: Acts, depictions, descriptions, promotion, or ideation of self-harm or suicide.
locales.name: Self-Harm

locales.description: Acts, depictions, descriptions, or promotion of child abuse.
locales.name: Child Abuse

locales.description: Acts, depictions, descriptions, or promotion of animal abuse.
locales.name: Animal Abuse

locales.description: Depictions, descriptions, or promotion of fire and/or flames.
locales.name: Fire

locales.description: Depictions, descriptions, or promotion of firearms.
locales.name: Firearms

locales.description: Depictions, descriptions, or promotion of latex, leather, rubber, and other materials used to evoke the sensation of dead flesh.
locales.name: Latex/Leather/Rubber

locales.description: Acts, depictions, descriptions, or promotion of bigotry, including racism, sexism, ablism, homophobia, transphobia, and acephobia.  (Individual labels are not provided for brevity)
locales.name: Bigotry

locales.description: Denial or downplaying the death count, risks, transmissibility, or existance of COVID-19.
locales.name: COVID-19 denial

locales.description: Promotion, support, or legitimization of any conservative political party.
locales.name: Conservatism

locales.description: Denial or downplaying the effectiveness of vaccines.
locales.name: Vaccine denial

locales.description: Denial or downplaying any genocide, historical or ongoing.
locales.name: Genocide denial

locales.description: Posts aimed at creating fear, uncertainty, and doubt about AI.
locales.name: AI FUD

locales.description: Myths about taxes (primarially US), using IRS publications as a guide
locales.name: Tax Misinformation

locales.description: Posts aimed at creating fear, uncertainty, and doubt about genetically modified organisms.
locales.name: GMO FUD

locales.description: Promotion, support, or legitimazation of a philosophy aimed at limiting access to cities to a certain class or race.
locales.name: Urbanism

locales.description: Links, discussion, or promotion of certain sites.
locales.name: Darksites

locales.description: Medical malfeasance, using the publications of Quackwatch as a guide.
locales.name: Quackery

locales.description: Depictions, descriptions, or promotion of drugs (including alcohol and tobacco)
locales.name: Drugs/Alcohol/Tobacco
